docs.text: movie concepts are often pitched to producers with mathematical formulas involving successful films of the past .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: so , undoubtedly one day someone said , " 'evolution ? '
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's 'ghostbusters' plus 'men in black' plus 'tremors . ' "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and so it is .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: sum total none .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the alienbusting begins when a meteor lands in glen canyon , arizona .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: community college science profs ira kane ( david duchovny ) and harry block ( orlando jones ) take some samples from the meteor and discover that one-celled organisms from inside it are evolving rapidly , doing in hours what took millions of years for life on earth .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: just about the time i was wondering , " hey , doesn't the government usually come in and take over the whole area in these movies , " the government came in and took over the whole area .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the leader of the pack , gen . woodman ( ted levine ) , turns out to be an old nemesis of ira's , and ira and harry are blocked from doing further research .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: meanwhile , the organisms continue to grow until they are large enough to start attacking people .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: by this time , ira and harry have gained a friend in dr . allison reed ( julianne moore ) of the center for disease control .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: a country club poolboy , wayne green ( seann william scott ) , has also attached himself to the merry band .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but can they find the means to stop the aliens in time ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: director ivan reitman seems to be revisiting his biggest hit , 1984's " ghostbusters , " but " evolution " falls miserably short .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: one reason is readily apparent .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " ghostbusters " had three really funny guys as its scientists ( bill murray , dan aykroyd , and harold ramis ) , but " evolution " has one really funny guy ( orlando jones ) who can adlib and milk the comic potential of lines that prove useless in anyone else's hands .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: for good measure , " ghostbusters " had the comic talents of rick moranis ; " evolution " offers seann william scott , who was much funnier in " american pie " and " road trip " than he is here .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: scott has one amusing scene where he sings " you are so beautiful to me " to a dragon-like alien to draw it into a trap .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: other than that , scott seems unable to make much of the thin material the writers gave him .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: an actor in search of a forte , david duchovny looked for his gritty action hero side in " playing god " and his romantic side in " return to me . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: now he wants to find his wacky comedic talent ; what we all find is that he doesn't have any .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: look for him to be back on tv in five years or so .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: another sad case is julianne moore , who needs to be more selective about the offers she accepts .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: she's a talented actress with an impressive list of credits and award nominations , so why is she trying to do slapstick comedy ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: her character has a tendency to trip over and bump into things , but the trait comes off as a pathetic plea for laughs .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the sole saving grace of the film is jones .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he's at the center of the movie's funniest scene -- where an alien bug invades harry's body and has to be pulled out through his ass .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: jones is the only cast member who can take the comedic ball and run with it , but he can't carry the whole movie by himself .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he found himself in a similar situation in " the replacements , " where he was also the only comic talent in an ensemble cast .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: jones will eventually find the project that will make him a major comedy star , but this isn't it .
docs.label: negative
